description: Easy-peasy until today it just disappeared. It says it is installed, but it won't open. And all my notes are gone--poof! And all my passwords with it. It's not to be trusted.
summary: Easy-peasy until today it just disappeared

description: I've been using it on debian. Greate Apps!
These are good notes, but I wasn't able to move tem around on my desktop which is really annoying, and defeats most of my purposes.
Remember to Ctrl+mouse to move sticky notes! And this is best used as if you were using real sticky notes. Please don;t put your passwords here. if so back up the notes in your ~/.config/xpad files.
summary: Love this app. It is a must have for me!

description: It removed all my notes after restart
Can't move it around your desktop
I think the notes work great - the app fulfils my requirements with a no nonsense interface.

It never remove notes, all you gotta do is click right button, and go to notes.
also make sure to have a directory called "autostart" in the /home/yourname/.config/autostart/
summary: It works fine. Don't listen to newbie reviews

description: Used it for months until an update lost all my notes. Don't trust it anymore. (You only had one job)
What's up dev? "Close and Save Pad" - NOT.

I use a different app for notes, thought I'd try this one out. It has a clean interface and a nice set of preferences. It is a little irritating to have to forcefully turn on the window decorations to move them around, though, if they can be moved without doing that, it wasn't intuitive.

Nice edit controls on the bottom of the screen. 

I didn't use it long enough to know if notes get lost as others have reported, but the authors should make it crystal clear this problem has been resolved - otherwise, no reasonable user will trust it.
you can not drag and drop it
can't move notes around
it only lack of possibility of moving the notes without window title (wondow decoration) and alarm option
Simple Sticky Notes, I don't need anything fancy with synchronization (just like a normal sticky note).
Uninstalled this as fast as I could. No clear way to set preferences. Very clumsy and unfriendly.
This app works well and has all the basic functionality to capture random transient notes.

I just installed this, and like it. Simple, works out-of-the-box, and with a README file showing at first launch. Several things:
1. You can drag the notes by Ctrl+click+drag. (Mentioned in README)
2. You will not lose your data. Now they are in ~/.config/xpad. Before upgrade please backup the data, but I don't think these data would be lost during the upgrade. (Mentioned in README)
3. How to hide from windows manager, how to set font and color, etc, all mentioned in README.
So, 5 stars. 
If you want to read this README again, it is under /usr/share/doc/xpad/README. You are welcome.
summary: Like this, all problems solved in README before first launch, READ IT!

description: bagus sekali xpad
Can you please add. Drag and Move functionality.
die Texte werden nicht gespeichert. (ubuntu 18.04)
Die Texte werden nicht gespeichert und Xpad startet automatisch nach dem anmelden.
No permite mover las notas se quedan donde aparecen
summary: No permite mover las notas se quedan donde aparecen

description: no te permite mover las notas de lugar.
summary: es buena, pero le falta mejorar

description: En la mayoria de los caso te pemite move Notas si precionas ctrl + Hold LMB en la zona donde escribes la nota, mientras mantengas precionado LMB no importa si retiras la tecla Ctrl podras mover la ventana hasta donde decidas soltar el LMB.
les notes restes scotchées ou elles veulent, impossible de les déplacer sur le bureau..... je désinstalle !

Très utile pour ma pars. 
A noter qu'il est tout à fait possible de deplacer le post-it, il suffit de faire la manipulation suivante:
[click droit] sur la note -> préférences -> [cocher la case nommée] "Afficher les décorations de fenêtres"
Merci.

Je n'ai pas réussi à modifier ma première notation, alors voici un nouvel avis, sur l'appli.
En effet après réglage (pas évident a trouver, merci au commentaire précédent) j'ai réussi à intégrer parfaitement les notes à mon bureau, c'est nickel !
Si quelqu'un sait comment je peux effacer mon précédent commentaire je suis preneur.
summary: Je modifie mon appréciation de nullissime à pas mal

description: Ce n'est pas vraiment mon application préféré, mais vu que ça reste simple d'utilisation, je le recommande :3

Peu intuitif, peu personnalisable, encombre le dock d'une icône supplémentaire, ne conserve pas l'emplacement après un redémarrage, certaines notes disparaissent, un bug de fenêtre lorsque l'on règle les préférences.
summary: Peu utile et ne fonctionne pas bien sous Ubuntu 18.04.4 Gnome 3.28.2

description: Comme toujours avec les applications Linux, le look laisse à désirer, mais ont le mérite d'exister. Très simple pour déplacer le postit : appui sir CTRL et on le traîne où on veut... Ceci dit, ça reste un postit et c'est tout ce qu'on demande !

Malgré les conseilles d'un côté, la solution ne marche pas.
Les post it ne sont pas déplaçable, donc inutiles.
summary: Impossible de déplacer les post it

description: Либо я не нашел, за куда можно взяться, чтобы переместить стикер, либо этой важной функции нет. Жаль(
